meanings.sent1: The children giggled at the ninnies in the clown costumes.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those ninnies who say you can't achieve your dreams.
meanings.sent3: The ninnies at the party kept telling jokes that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a ninnie when she realized she had been wearing mismatched socks all day.
meanings.sent5: The ninnies in the story always brought humor and light-heartedness to the plot.

meanings.sent1: The ninnies of the group decided to play a prank on their friend.
meanings.sent2: His ninnies during the meeting caused everyone to burst into laughter.
meanings.sent3: The ninnies of the office always made Mondays more bearable with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her ninnies were like a breath of fresh air in the serious atmosphere of the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The ninnies of the play added a touch of comedy to the otherwise intense storyline.
